channel.title: Runespace
channel.description:
Hey guys Runespace told me to tell you guys this; Ajs cousin lives in bexley, they havent got power OR Water yet so daniel came to stay with him. Daniel was with him on mopar and created a new account because he plays the minecraft server. So he Didnt Actually make double accounts. His cousin made his own
( I bet i will get flammed for this..)

item.title: Runespace
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

He can tell his cousin to join the site when they get water and electricity back home. An IP ban is an IP ban, we don’t accept the cousin/friend/neighbour arguement here, as anyone can claim that. (and the majority of them do, it’s not new to us)

Read full topic

item.title: Runespace
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

I was actually talking to Aj when this took place, and he told me his cousin was joining moparscape.
Staff didnt even ask him about the circumstances, just banned.
Thats not professional.

Read full topic

item.title: Runespace
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Its convenient though that a new account was created on his IP around the same time he was banned. Not saying I do or don’t believe him but the evidence is against him here.

Read full topic

item.title: Runespace
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

So he got banned? damn…

Read full topic
